trans-unit.source: Configure your tenant by allocating the capacity units based on your business needs.

seg-source.mrk: Configure your tenant by allocating the capacity units based on your business needs.

target.mrk: 비즈니스 요구에 맞게 용량 단위를 할당하여 테넌트를 구성합니다.

trans-unit.source: Configuring your tenant is relevant for SAP Data Warehouse Cloud tenants that are deployed as of October 12, 2021.

seg-source.mrk: Configuring your tenant is relevant for SAP Data Warehouse Cloud tenants that are deployed as of October 12, 2021.

target.mrk: 테넌트 구성은 2021년 10월 12일자로 배포된 SAP Data Warehouse Cloud 테넌트에 적용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You've logged into your <pname id="SAP-DWC-LONG">SAP Data Warehouse Cloud</pname> tenant for the first time and you need to allocate the capacity units to compute and storages resources. According to your needs, you can keep or change the default provisioning of your tenant based on your contract.

seg-source.mrk: You've logged into your <pname id="SAP-DWC-LONG">SAP Data Warehouse Cloud</pname> tenant for the first time and you need to allocate the capacity units to compute and storages resources.
According to your needs, you can keep or change the default provisioning of your tenant based on your contract.

target.mrk: <pname id="SAP-DWC-LONG">SAP Data Warehouse Cloud</pname> 테넌트에 처음으로 로그인한 상태이며 컴퓨팅 리소스와 저장 리소스에 용량 단위를 할당해야 합니다.
필요에 따라, 계약 내용에 기반하여 테넌트의 기본 프로비저닝을 그대로 사용하거나 변경해서 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Your contract includes a total number of available capacity units per month which you can allocate as you wish to the compute and storage resources.

seg-source.mrk: Your contract includes a total number of available capacity units per month which you can allocate as you wish to the compute and storage resources.

target.mrk: 계약에 포함되어 있는 월별 총 가용 용량 단위 수를 컴퓨팅 리소스와 저장 리소스에 원하는 만큼 할당할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: As long as you have not configured the tenant, you can use only administration features of <pname>SAP Data Warehouse Cloud</pname> (but you cannot create spaces in the Space Management page).

seg-source.mrk: As long as you have not configured the tenant, you can use only administration features of <pname>SAP Data Warehouse Cloud</pname> (but you cannot create spaces in the Space Management page).

target.mrk: 테넌트를 구성하지 않은 상태에서는 <pname>SAP Data Warehouse Cloud</pname>의 관리 기능만 사용할 수 있습니다(단, “공간 관리” 페이지에서 공간을 생성할 수는 없음).

trans-unit.source: Once you save the configuration of your tenant, you cannot change it.

seg-source.mrk: Once you save the configuration of your tenant, you cannot change it.

target.mrk: 테넌트 구성을 저장한 후에는 변경이 불가능합니다.

trans-unit.source: The whole process may take more than 90 minutes.

seg-source.mrk: The whole process may take more than 90 minutes.

target.mrk: 전체 프로세스에 90분을 넘는 시간이 소요될 수 있습니다.
